oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wedding reception, Frank and Charlotte Adkins
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Newlyweds Charlotte Nicodemus and Frank Adkins with Charlotte's family at their wedding reception in the Nicodemus home in Winchester, Virginia. Frank and Charlotte were married November 11, 1942.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Adkins, Charlotte Nicodemus V., 1919-1987; Adkins, Frank E., 1914-1945
